snippet: Maria Hassabi’s “Show,” part of the River to River Festival, placed live performance in front of the New York Stock Exchange, inviting passers-by to stop and watch.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews dance performance by Maria Hassabi and Hristoula Harakas on the street in front of the New York Stock Exchange as part of the River to River Festival.
lead_paragraph: Maria Hassabi’s “Show,” part of the River to River Festival, placed live performance in front of the New York Stock Exchange, inviting passers-by to stop and watch.

headline.seo: ‘Show,’ by Maria Hassabi, in River to River Festival
headline.main: Life and Live Performance, Brought Together With Dance
headline.print_headline: Life and Live Performance, Brought Together With Dance
